name: Countries

aliases.name: Country
aliases.comment:
The Country record type.

  - name: The [ISO 3166-1](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-1) Country name
  - code: [ISO 3166-1 alpha-2](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-1_alpha-2) two-letter Country code
  - flag: The Country's unicode emoji flag, see [Regional Indicator Symbol](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Regional_Indicator_Symbol)

This type is intentionally not opaque, as accessing the countries reference data as easily as possible is the primary goal.
aliases.type: { name : String.String, code : String.String, flag : String.String }

values.name: all
values.comment: The full list of all 249 current [ISO 3166-1](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-1) Country records.

values.name: fromCode
values.comment: Find a country by its [ISO 3166-1 alpha-2](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-1_alpha-2) two-letter country code.

values.name: search
values.comment: Search all Countries by case-insensitive string matching on name and code
